title: CRICKET: Sri Lanka announces provisional squads for Australia Tour
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket on Friday (20) announced that the Sri Lanka Cricket Selection Committee selected the provisional squads covering all formats
of the game in order to prepare for the upcoming Australia Tour of Sri Lanka 2022.
Sri Lanka: Prime Minister welcomes G7 announcement on debt relief
SJB suspends party membership of Harin Fernando & Manusha Nanayakkara
